players.name: remorse
players.description:
https://ozfortress.com/forums/threads/431?page=2#post_1971

Tier 3: Serious or repeated abuse of any kind
Issued 03/07/20
Expires 03/07/22
30 points

players.name: Ravu4
players.description:
Sigma Rule #1: DDOS all casted games. Force people to stick to their own grindset.
Sigma Rule #2: Deny all mercs. Time spent dealing with requests from betas is time lost.
Sigma Rule #3: Don't follow the community rules, infractions are meaningless to someone operating outside the hierarchy.

How-to Guides

--- ### Match Details This match is to be played during the Round 1 dates found within the [Key Dates](https://ozfortress.com/forums/threads/1165) page, which is also linked as a button above. > Disclaimer: We are no longer putting the specific Round dates in each match thread to minimize the amount of repetition during match generation, and we feel most players know by now what the match days are. --- ### Reminders - During Sixes Season 37 we plan on conducting random demo checks to ensure players are recording POV demos. Please ensure that you are recording match demos in order to avoid punishment. - If you are unsure of whether or not something is considered a game exploit, contact a League Administrator for clarification. Ignorance is not an excuse.
